Summary: Cicular object on Google earth Printed pictures.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy grandaughter was reinstalling Google on my computer [second time] Instead of the earth showing on the screen a white rectangle with a yellow stripe going through it was on the screen. There was a small black dot in the middle. I scrolled closer there was a darker shadow starting in front of and trialing far behind the round object.[Looks like a shock wave??] Scrolling closer there is a long "tail" [looks like a contrail??]Scrolling closer the cicular object has a black oval in back, yellow debis is streaming over the front edge giving an indication the front is round. I scrolled out and the object is of a small island in the Kara sea just off the north coast of Russia. From the pictures I guess it was under water. It was heading it looked like East-North-East. Iprinted up 7 pictures from different depths. Why would Google Earth come on in that exact location??? I clicked on to another sight[you guys] When I clicked back on to Google Earth it rolled back to the exact same place???
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Charleroi
There were no other sightings in Charleroi on or around May 29th 2010
